questions.text:
#### Q1. How can you increase the CPU resources for your Lambda?

- %OPTION% `Increase the configured CPU value`
- %OPTION% `Increase the configured timeout value`
- %OPTION% `Increase the configured memory value`
- %OPTION% `Increase the configured concurrency value`

#### Q2. How can additional code or content be provided for your Lambda?

- %OPTION% `blocks`
- %OPTION% `layers`
- %OPTION% `aliases`
- %OPTION% `handlers`

#### Q3. How can Step Functions call Lambdas?

- %OPTION% `in sequence`
- %OPTION% `both of these answers`
- %OPTION% `neither of these answers`
- %OPTION% `in parallel`

#### Q4. Which AWS CLI command invokes a function?

- %OPTION% `aws lambda invoke --function ReturnBucketName outputfile.txt`
- %OPTION% `aws lambda execute --function-name ReturnBucketName outputfile.txt`
- %OPTION% `aws lambda invoke --function-name ReturnBucketName outputfile.txt`
- %OPTION% `aws lambda execute --function ReturnBucketName outputfile.txt`

#### Q5. What adds tracing capabilities to a Lambda?

- %OPTION% `AWS Trace`
- %OPTION% `CloudStack`
- %OPTION% `CloudTrail`
- %OPTION% `AWS X-Ray`

#### Q6. You need to build a continuous integration/deployment pipeline for a set of Lambdas. What should you do?

- %OPTION% `Create configuration files and deploy them using AWS CodePipeline.`
- %OPTION% `Create CloudFormation templates and deploy them using AWS CodeBuild`
- %OPTION% `Create configuration file and deploy using AWS CodeBuild`
- %OPTION% `Create CloudFormation templates and deploy them using AWS CodePipeline.`

#### Q7. What can you use to monitor function invocations?

- %OPTION% `API Gateway`
- %OPTION% `S3`
- %OPTION% `SAS`
- %OPTION% `CLoudTrail`

#### Q8. It is AWS best practice to enable Lambda logging by which of these methods.

- %OPTION% `Use S3 metrics and CloudWatch alarms`
- %OPTION% `Create custom metrics within your Lambda code.`
- %OPTION% `Create custom metrics within your CloudWatch code.`
- %OPTION% `Use Lambda metrics and CloudWatch alarms.`

#### Q9. What may be provided for environment variables?

- %OPTION% `an SSL certificate`
- %OPTION% `a bitmask`
- %OPTION% `an AWS KMS key`
- %OPTION% `an HTTP protocol `

#### Q10. Lambdas allow for running of what other things?

- %OPTION% `binaries.`
- %OPTION% `all of these answers`
- %OPTION% `executables`
- %OPTION% `Shell scripts`

#### Q11. In what style must you write Lambda code?

- %OPTION% `MVC`
- %OPTION% `virtual`
- %OPTION% `stateless`
- %OPTION% `protocol`

#### Q12. How can a developer provide Lambda code?

- %OPTION% `by uploading a .zip file`
- %OPTION% `all of these answers`
- %OPTION% `by editing inline`
- %OPTION% `from an S3 bucket`

#### Q13. You are performance-testing your Lambda to verify that you set the memory size adequately. Where do you verify the execution overhead?

- %OPTION% `CLoudWatch logs`
- %OPTION% `DynamoDB logs`
- %OPTION% `S3 logs`
- %OPTION% `Lambda logs.`

#### Q14. What facilitates continuous delivery of Lambdas?

- %OPTION% `CodeStack`
- %OPTION% `ElasticStack`
- %OPTION% `Mobile Hub`
- %OPTION% `CodeDeploy`

#### Q15. How are computing resources allocated to Lambdas?

- %OPTION% `proportionally`
- %OPTION% `equally`
- %OPTION% `periodically`
- %OPTION% `daily`

#### Q16. You can restrict the scope of a user's permissions by specifying which two items in an IAM policy?

- %OPTION% `resources and users`
- %OPTION% `resources and conditions`
- %OPTION% `events and users`
- %OPTION% `events and conditions`

#### Q17. What does Lambda logging include?

- %OPTION% `logging streams`
- %OPTION% `rotating streams`
- %OPTION% `logging events`
- %OPTION% `advancing log groups`

#### Q18. What can AWS Amplify NOT do for a Lambda?

- %OPTION% `create a Lambda`
- %OPTION% `be an event source`
- %OPTION% `assign an IAM role`
- %OPTION% `delete a Lambda`

#### Q19. How do you author a Lambda in a programming language that AWS does not support?

- %OPTION% `Create a Lambda function with a custom runtime and reference the function in your Lambda`
- %OPTION% `Create a Lambda layer with a custom runtime and reference the layer in your lambda`
- %OPTION% `You cannot use Lambda in this situation`
- %OPTION% `Create a Lambda function with a custom runtime`

#### Q20. What are listed downstream resources based on?

- %OPTION% `the execution policy`
- %OPTION% `the Lambda configuration`
- %OPTION% `the Lambda nodes`
- %OPTION% `the IAM user`

#### Q21. Which is an equivalent and valid tag for a pair of Lambdas?

- %OPTION% `department:Sales,department:Sales`
- %OPTION% `department:Sales,department:sales`
- %OPTION% `aws:demo;aws:demo`
- %OPTION% `aws:demo;aws:DEMO`

#### Q22. Outbound connections from Lambdas must be `_`.

- %OPTION% `neither of these answers`
- %OPTION% `UDP/IP`
- %OPTION% `TCP/IP`
- %OPTION% `both of these answers`

#### Q23. How are CloudWatch actions configured?

- %OPTION% `automatically`
- %OPTION% `none of these answers`
- %OPTION% `manually`
- %OPTION% `ad hoc`

#### Q24. You are testing your stream-based application and the associated Lambda. AWS best practice advises you to test by varying what?

- %OPTION% `stream and record sizes`
- %OPTION% `stream and shard sizes`
- %OPTION% `batch and record sizes`
- %OPTION% `batch and shard sizes`

#### Q25. You need to make your Lambda available to services in multiple VPCs. What do you do?

- %OPTION% `Place each subnet in a VPC. Associate all subnets to your Lambda.`
- %OPTION% `Place all subnets in a VPC. Associate all subnets to your Lambda.`
- %OPTION% `Configure your Lambda to be available to multiple VPCs.`
- %OPTION% `Configure all application VPCs to be peered.`

#### Q26. How is the cost associated with Lambda function calculated?

- %OPTION% `number of function calls`
- %OPTION% `amount of code run`
- %OPTION% `compute time`
- %OPTION% `amount of infrastructure used`

#### Q27. What is the fastest way to get started with Lambda?

- %OPTION% `Author a Lambda from scratch.`
- %OPTION% `Use a blueprint.`
- %OPTION% `Use a .zip deployment package.`
- %OPTION% `Use the serverless app repository.`

#### Q28. Where is the disk space allocated for Lambda functions?

- %OPTION% `/tmp`
- %OPTION% `/default`
- %OPTION% `/temp`
- %OPTION% `/ds`

#### Q29. How do you stop a running Lambda that is stuck in a recursive loop?

- %OPTION% `Delete the function.`
- %OPTION% `Set the function concurrent execution limit to 0 while you update the code.`
- %OPTION% `Reset the function.`
- %OPTION% `Set the function concurrent execution limit to 100 while you update the code.`

#### Q30. What is AWS best practice for Lambda configuration?

- %OPTION% `Overprovision memory to run your functions faster and reduce your costs. Do not overprovision your function timeout settings.`
- %OPTION% `Overprovision memory and your function timeout settings to run your functions faster and reduce your costs.`
- %OPTION% `Do not overprovision memory. Overprovision your function timeout settings to run your functions faster and reduce costs.`
- %OPTION% `Do not overprovision memory. Do not overprovision your function timeout settings to run your functions faster and reduce costs.`

#### Q31. Basic Lambda permissions include permissions for what?

- %OPTION% `removing log groups`
- %OPTION% `none of these answers`
- %OPTION% `creating log groups`
- %OPTION% `updating log groups`

#### Q32. How are environment variables stored?

- %OPTION% `DynamoDB tables`
- %OPTION% `key-value pairs`
- %OPTION% `S3 buckets`
- %OPTION% `none of these answers`

#### Q33. You need to use a Lambda to provide backend logic to your website. Which service do you use to make your Lambda available to your website?

- %OPTION% `S3`
- %OPTION% `API Gateway`
- %OPTION% `X-Ray`
- %OPTION% `DynamoDB`

#### Q34. You are creating a Lambda to trigger on change to files in an S3 bucket. Where should you put the bucket name?

- %OPTION% `in the Lambda function code`
- %OPTION% `in a Lambda environment variable`
- %OPTION% `in the Lambda tags`
- %OPTION% `in another S3 bucket`

#### Q35. What action is needed before you can test a Lambda?

- %OPTION% `Deploy the Lambda`
- %OPTION% `Export the function`
- %OPTION% `none of these answers`
- %OPTION% `Configure a test event`

#### Q36. What kind of packages can you use with Node.js for Lambdas?

- %OPTION% `Fleece`
- %OPTION% `NPM`
- %OPTION% `none of these answers`
- %OPTION% `Pod`

#### Q37. Lambdas are monitored by default using which service?

- %OPTION% `CloudTrail`
- %OPTION% `CloudWatch`
- %OPTION% `CloudFormation`
- %OPTION% `LogWatch`

#### Q38. What can trigger a Lambda function execution?

- %OPTION% `a table definition`
- %OPTION% `queue isolation`
- %OPTION% `STS Write`
- %OPTION% `an SNS topic`

#### Q39. You need to set an S3 event trigger on your Lambda to respond when data is added to your bucket from another S3 bucket. Which event type do you configure?

- %OPTION% `POST`
- %OPTION% `"All object create events"`
- %OPTION% `PUT`
- %OPTION% `COPY`

#### Q40. To make Lambdas more testable, it is AWS best practice to separate which of these?

- %OPTION% `Lambda configuration from logging code`
- %OPTION% `Lambda handler from logging code`
- %OPTION% `Lambda handler from core logic`
- %OPTION% `Lambda configuration from core logic`

#### Q41. What is included in an exported Lambda deployment package?

- %OPTION% `YAML definition`
- %OPTION% `CloudFormation stack configuration`
- %OPTION% `SAML deployment stack`
- %OPTION% `Zip file of all related files`

#### Q42. When can you change the execution role of a Lambda?

- %OPTION% `only at creation`
- %OPTION% `only before deployment`
- %OPTION% `never`
- %OPTION% `anytime via configuration`

#### Q43. What is the relationship between SAM template and CloudFormation template files?

- %OPTION% SAM templates are a superset of CloudFormation templates. SAM templates include additional resource types.
- %OPTION% SAM templates have some overlap with CloudFormation templates. Both SAM and CloudFormation templates include resource types that are not in the other type of template.
- %OPTION% CloudFormation templates are a superset of SAM templates. CloudFormation templates include additional resource types.
- %OPTION% SAM templates are a different name for CloudFormation templates. Both template types include the same resource types.

#### Q44. What service deploys Lambdas regionally?

- %OPTION% `EdgeCloud`
- %OPTION% `CloudEdge`
- %OPTION% `CloudFront`
- %OPTION% `CloudStack`

#### Q45. What programming language does AWS Lambda support?

- %OPTION% `custom`
- %OPTION% `all of these answers`
- %OPTION% `Java`
- %OPTION% `Ruby`

#### Q46. You need to setup a mechanism to put controls in place to notify you when you have a spike in Lambda concurrency. What should you do?

- %OPTION% Deploy a CloudTrail alarm that notifies you when function metrics exceed your threshold. Create an AWS budget to monitor costs.
- %OPTION% Deploy a CloudWatch alarm that notifies you when function metrics exceed your threshold. Create an AWS budget to monitor costs.
- %OPTION% Deploy a CloudWatch alarm that notifies you when function metrics exceed your threshold. Create an AWS CostMonitor to monitor costs.
- %OPTION% Deploy a CloudTrail alarm that notifies you when function metrics exceed your threshold. Create an AWS CostMonitor to monitor costs.

#### Q47. You want to minimize cold start time for your Lambda. What do you do?

- %OPTION% Add extra code to check if the transient cache, or the /tmp directory, has the data that you stored.
- %OPTION% Add extra code to check if the permanent cache, or the /cache directory, has the data that you stored.
- %OPTION% Do nothing. AWS minimizes cols start time by default.
- %OPTION% Create a warm-up Lambda that calls your Lambda every minute

[Reference](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/compute/new-for-aws-lambda-predictable-start-up-times-with-provisioned-concurrency/

#### Q48. When is Lambda code stored encrypted?

- %OPTION% at rest
- %OPTION% at runtime
- %OPTION% at deployment
- %OPTION% non of these answers

[Reference](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/whitepapers/latest/security-overview-aws-lambda/lambda-functions-and-layers.html)

#### Q49. When you use a resource-based policy to give a service, resource, or account access to your function, how can you apply the scope of that permission??

- %OPTION% at the function levelat the function level
- %OPTION% at the alias or function levelat the alias or function level
- %OPTION% at the version, alias, or function levelat the version, alias, or function level
- %OPTION% at the version or function level

#### Q50. Lambda can read events from which other AWS services? (ref-https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/lambda-services.html)

- %OPTION% Kinesis, S3, and SQS
- %OPTION% Kinesis, S3, and SNS
- %OPTION% Kinesis, DynamoDB, and SNS
- %OPTION% Kinesis, DynamoDB, and SQS

en.TITLE: Skill Assessments Quizzes
en.DESC:
Collection of questions and answers on different subjects aimed to help
you test your knowledge before an important job interview!

Data from __data__. UI by __bandinopla__

es.TITLE: Questionarios de evaluación de habilidades
es.DESC:
Colección de preguntas y respuestas sobre diferentes temas orientadas a
ayudarte a testear tu conocimiento antes de una importante entrevista de trabajo! 

Datos de __data__. UI por __bandinopla__
